item.title: It was "not" Lakshmi Prasad All Along - The Legend of Lakshmi Prasad
item.description: Welcome to my first post on this “book blog”. Since I am not a professional at this, expect this to be a bumpy ride (I surely expect to laugh at myself after a few years when I read this again). Have fun. Although I am not truly a beginner to reading per se, I took the list of best books for beginners from BookWritten, one of my favourite sites and go-to’s for book recommendations, and picked “The Legend of Lakshmi Prasad” written by Twinkle Khanna.
